description: Informs customers about all the calls that are missed while being away from the network (i.e., Busy, Switched Off, or Unreachable).
mode: Recurring Mode (customers don't have to re-subscribe)

description: Make economical IP calls from anywhere in the world. Once you have login details, just connect to the internet and enjoy the service.

MiDas - The Learning App is developed to meet all types of educational needs of Nursery to Grade10 students and their parents. It includes curriculum-based study materials, communication tools and talent show platform.

company: Samartha Marketing and Management Pvt. Ltd.
description: Puzzle games are the quickest and fun way to engage the mind and improve attention, memory and reaction skills. Adding Contests to it just makes it a whole lot of fun! The game - 'Unpuzzle' is a simple & unique images-based puzzle game. Find the famous people hidden behind the jumbled boxes. Guess the correct name and know fun facts about them. Release stress and indulge yourself.
